ns0:entry.ns0:title: cloudposse/terraform-aws-backup
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-backup
Language: hcl
Terraform module to provision AWS Backup, a fully managed backup service that makes it easy to centralize and automate the back up of data across AWS services such as EBS volumes, RDS databases, DynamoDB tables, EFS file systems, and AWS Storage Gateway volumes.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: cloudposse/terraform-aws-codebuild
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-codebuild
Language: hcl
Terraform Module to easily leverage AWS CodeBuild for Continuous Integration

ns0:entry.ns0:title: cloudposse/terraform-aws-ecs-container-definition
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-ecs-container-definition
Language: hcl
Terraform module to generate well-formed JSON documents (container definitions) that are passed to the aws_ecs_task_definition Terraform resource

ns0:entry.ns0:content:
